snippet: On the IHT Rendezvous blog, Jack Ewing, European economics correspondent, has responded to readers' questions about potential runs on banks, the utility of German inflation and how a Greek exit from the euro would work.
abstract: On the IHT Rendezvous blog, Jack Ewing, European economics correspondent, has responded to readers' questions about potential runs on banks, the utility of German inflation and how a Greek exit from the euro would work.
